select m_crm_opportunity.id, m_crm_opportunity.opportunityName, m_crm_opportunity.currencyid, m_crm_opportunity.accountid, m_crm_opportunity.amount, m_crm_opportunity.type, m_crm_opportunity.source, m_crm_opportunity.expectedClosedDate, m_crm_opportunity.campaignid, m_crm_opportunity.nextStep, m_crm_opportunity.probability, m_crm_opportunity.description, m_crm_opportunity.createdTime, m_crm_opportunity.createdUser, m_crm_opportunity.sAccountId, m_crm_opportunity.assignUser, m_crm_opportunity.opportunityType, m_crm_opportunity.salesStage, m_crm_opportunity.lastUpdatedTime, s_user.avatarId AS assignUserAvatarId, LTRIM(concat(s_user.firstname, ' ', LTRIM(concat(IFNULL(s_user.middlename, ''), ' ')), s_user.lastname)) AS assignUserFullName, m_crm_account.accountName, m_crm_campaign.campaignName, createdUserTabl.avatarId AS createdUserAvatarId, LTRIM(concat(createdUserTabl.firstname, ' ', LTRIM(concat(IFNULL(createdUserTabl.middlename, ''), ' ')), createdUserTabl.lastname)) as createdUserFullName
FROM m_crm_opportunity LEFT OUTER JOIN m_crm_account ON (m_crm_opportunity.accountid=m_crm_account.id) LEFT OUTER JOIN s_user ON (m_crm_opportunity.assignUser = s_user.username) LEFT OUTER JOIN s_user AS createdUserTabl ON (m_crm_opportunity.createdUser = createdUserTabl.username) LEFT OUTER JOIN m_crm_campaign ON (m_crm_opportunity.campaignid = m_crm_campaign.id)

SELECT m_crm_opportunity.salesStage AS groupid, COALESCE(SUM(m_crm_opportunity.amount), 0) AS value, '' AS groupname FROM m_crm_opportunity #ifnotnull($_parameter.searchCriteria) #trimext("WHERE" "AND|OR")
#end #end GROUP BY m_crm_opportunity.salesStage

SELECT m_crm_opportunity.salesStage AS groupid, COUNT(m_crm_opportunity.salesStage) AS value, '' as groupname FROM m_crm_opportunity #ifnotnull($_parameter.searchCriteria) #trimext("WHERE" "AND|OR")
#end #end GROUP BY m_crm_opportunity.salesStage

SELECT m_crm_opportunity.source AS groupid, SUM((SELECT m_crm_opportunity.amount FROM m_crm_opportunity n WHERE n.id = m_crm_opportunity.id AND n.salesStage = 'Closed Won')) AS value, (SELECT count(*) FROM m_crm_opportunity mm WHERE m_crm_opportunity.source = mm.source) AS countNum, '' AS groupname FROM m_crm_opportunity #ifnotnull($_parameter.searchCriteria) #trimext("WHERE" "AND|OR")
AND m_crm_opportunity.source <> '' #end #end GROUP BY m_crm_opportunity.source
